cart.title: List of selected products
cart.description: These are all products that you yet chose (updated {{time}}).

products.title: Products list
products.description: Explore what we have in the store for you.

not-implemented.title: Feature not available yet
not-implemented.description: We are working on it day and night :))

empty-state.heading: No results found
empty-state.description: Unfortunately, there is nothing for you here yet!

not-found.heading: Page doesn't exist
not-found.description: Probably you got here by accident. If you think there is something wrong on our side, please contact us!

error.heading: Something went wrong
error.description: It sounds like something unexpected happened right now. Please, give it a try later or, if it's urgent, contact our support team.

server-error.heading: Something went seriously wrong
server-error.description: It sounds like something unexpected happened right now. Please, inform our support team about this issue ASAP!

not-found.heading: Product doesn't exist
not-found.description: Probably this product is no more for a sale or you just got here by accident. If you think there is something wrong on our side, please contact us!
